item.title: Give Back My Data
item.description: First, go watch John Oliver on data brokers. That segment opened my eyes to a problem I was aware of but had no idea of the scope. I immediately started researching how I could take better control of my data. It isn’t easy, and in some cases is impossible or will result in a major decrease in digital quality-of-life. So I’ve set out on this journey to see if cutting ties with organizations that sell my data is even possible, and I’m documenting it so you can try for yourself.
